alert.note: Alert for West Otter Tail; Wilkin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 3:24PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Otter Tail and northeastern Wilkin Counties through 400 PM CDT... At 324 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Rothsay, or 17 miles northwest of Fergus Falls, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Rothsay around 330 PM CDT. Erhard around 350 PM CDT. This includes Interstate 94 in Minnesota between mile markers 29 and 46. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
